column4: I got terminal server client installed and running with vnc but I cant send CTRL ALT DEL
i even did a man tsclient.. nothing in there
yes im aware of the cmd prompt
what i want to do is access a remote gui via vnc
n8: yes i do but how does that help???
that is NOT what i need to do :(
its locked and i know the password
i never said anything about rebooting
how are you connecting to the windows box?
i'm seeing in the forums that F8 can be used to send ctrl-alt-del. (supposedly you get a menu)
google 'ubuntu ctrl alt del terminal server windows' :)
and jrib: thats the thing about googling,... you never really know how to "word" your symptoms :)
